definition: wheel/disk/ring/steamship/to take turns/to rotate/by turn/classifier for big round objects: disk, or recurring events: round, turn
thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

sentences.english: The silhouette of a costume is its overall outline or contour.
sentences.chinese: 廓形是一件衣服的外輪廓線或者剪影。

sentences.english: It introduces a new kind of generating method of non-equidistant curves.
sentences.chinese: 提出了直紋面葉輪葉片非等距輪廓線的生成方法。

sentences.english: In terms of envelope theory, the mathematical formulation of the profile is derived for a fillet-end cutter.
sentences.chinese: 運用包絡原理，推導出掃掠輪廓線的計算公式。

sentences.english: Before the construction exact location of central line and external contour line of the pier is set out.
sentences.chinese: 施工前放出墩身中心線和外輪廓線的準確位置。

sentences.english: Joint profiles of natural rock can be considered as fractal curves.
sentences.chinese: 自然岩石節理表面輪廓線可以看作爲分形曲線。

sentences.english: The outlines of their faces are black lines, which are clear on the screen.
sentences.chinese: 面容輪廓線着黑色，於幕前觀看十分清晰透亮。

sentences.english: By varying the contour of a shape, you can easily make a page element stand out.
sentences.chinese: 通過變換形狀的輪廓線，你很容易就能凸顯頁面元素。

sentences.english: The area representing Q1 is indicated by contour shading .
sentences.chinese: 代表Q1的面積由打有陰影的輪廓線標出。

sentences.english: As not to protrude out with the ridge, the profile is mirrored and cuts back in to the ridge.
sentences.chinese: 爲了不突出山脊，輪廓線形成對稱並從山脊處削減。

sentences.english: Vectorization of the layer contour is studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了截面輪廓線的矢量化技術。

sentences.english: Extracting the sectional profile of pilled fabric with LOG (Laplacian of Gaussian) operator was investigated in this paper.
sentences.chinese: LOG算子對起球織物切面輪廓線的提取進行了分析。

definition: venation (pattern of veins on a leaf)
vein lines (in marble or fingerprint)/grain (in wood etc)
variant of 模擬|模拟[mo2 ni3]
to polish a text/rhetoric/ornate language/to use florid language to conceal errors/to gloss over
